    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex3">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_%&#10;{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}=\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},q}-R_{%&#10;b_{i},q})^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}." text="(sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2) = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, q)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, q))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2)" xml:id="S0.Ex3.m1">

                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex3.m1.14"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p4">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_definition_of_x_and_y" xml:id="S0.E1">
      <tags>
        <tag>(1)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle y({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\frac{1}{4}\sum_{e_{i}\,%&#10;\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}{R_{i}}^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}+\frac{3}{4}%&#10;\sum_{e_{i}\,\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_%&#10;{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}},\\&#10;\displaystyle x({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\,\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L%&#10;_{i}}^{2}{R_{i}}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}+\frac{3}{4}\sum_{e_{i}\,\in{E({\Gamma%&#10;})}}\frac{{L_{i}}{R_{i}}^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}-\frac{3}{4}\sum_{e_{i}\,%&#10;\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})%&#10;^{2}}.\end{split}" text="formulae@(y * Gamma = (1 / 4) * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ i) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2) + (3 / 4) * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2), x * Gamma = ((sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@(((L _ i) ^ 2 * R _ i) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2) + (3 / 4) * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ i) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2)) - (3 / 4) * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2))" xml:id="S0.E1.m1">

  <para xml:id="p6">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_kirchhoff_contraction1" xml:id="S0.E3">
      <tags>
        <tag>(3)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle(v-2)Kf({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{%&#10;R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}Kf({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})+\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma}%&#10;)}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\sum_{p\in\,{V({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}})}}r%&#10;_{{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}}(p,{\overline{p}_{i}}).\end{split}" text="(v - 2) * K * f * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) + (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (sum _ (p element-of V * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i))@(r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ i * open-interval@(p, (overline@(p)) _ i)))" xml:id="S0.E3.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S0.E3.m1.36"/>

      <Math mode="display" tex="r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)=2r_{{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}}(p,{\overline{p}_{i}})%&#10;+\frac{{L_{i}}{R_{i}}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}-2\frac{{L_{i}}R_{a_{i},p}R_{b_{i},p}}{%&#10;{R_{i}}({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})}." text="r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p) = (2 * r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ i * open-interval@(p, (overline@(p)) _ i) + (L _ i * R _ i) / (L _ i + R _ i)) - 2 * ((L _ i * R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) * R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) / (R _ i * (L _ i + R _ i)))" xml:id="S0.Ex4.m1">

  <para xml:id="p8">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn2term0" xml:id="S0.E4">
      <tags>
        <tag>(4)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4</tag>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)=\frac{{L_{i}}{R_{i}}}{{L_%&#10;{i}}+{R_{i}}}+2\frac{R_{a_{i},p}R_{b_{i},p}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}+2R_{c_{i},p}.%&#10;\end{split}" text="r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p) = (L _ i * R _ i) / (L _ i + R _ i) + 2 * ((R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) * R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) / (L _ i + R _ i)) + 2 * R _ (list@(c _ i, p))" xml:id="S0.E5.m1">

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex5">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle 2(v-2)Kf({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=2\sum_{e_{i}\in{E(%&#10;{\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}Kf({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})+2v\sum_{%&#10;e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}R_{a_{i},p}R_{b_{i},p}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{%&#10;2}}-v\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}{R_{i}}^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{%&#10;2}}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\qquad+\sum_{p\in{V({\Gamma})}}\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac%&#10;{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}(r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)).\end{split}" text="2 * (v - 2) * K * f * Gamma = ((2 * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) + 2 * v * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) * R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2)) - v * (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ i) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2)) + (sum _ (p element-of V * Gamma))@((sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p))))" xml:id="S0.Ex5.m1">

    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_expand_ri" xml:id="S0.E7">
      <tags>
        <tag>(7)</tag>

    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_expand_ri_same" xml:id="S0.E8">
      <tags>
        <tag>(8)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">8</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}R_{a_{i},p}%&#10;R_{b_{i},p}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}R%&#10;_{a_{i},q}R_{b_{i},q}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}},\qquad\text{for any vertices and%&#10; .}\end{split}" text="sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@(L _ i * R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) * R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@(L _ i * R _ (list@(a _ i, q)) * R _ (list@(b _ i, q))) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2@,@qquad@[for any vertices and .]" xml:id="S0.E8.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMWrap rule="Anything,">
              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                <XMRef idref="S0.E8.m1.1"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMRef idref="S0.E8.m1.3"/>

  <para xml:id="p14">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex6">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i}%&#10;,p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E(%&#10;{\Gamma})}}\frac{L_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\big{(}r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)\big{)%&#10;}-\sum_{q\in{V({\Gamma})}}({\upsilon}(q)-2)r(p,q)\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=2\sum_{q\in{V({\Gamma})}}r(p,q)-\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}%&#10;\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\big{(}r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)\big{)}.\end{split}" text="(sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2) = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p))) - (sum _ (q element-of V * Gamma))@((upsilon * q - 2) * r * open-interval@(p, q)) = 2 * (sum _ (q element-of V * Gamma))@(r * open-interval@(p, q)) - (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p)))" xml:id="S0.Ex6.m1">

        <tag>(9)</tag>

      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle r(p,x)=r(p,{p_{i}})+x,\qquad\frac{d}{dx}r(p,x)=1,%&#10;\quad\text{and }r(p,{p_{i}})-r(p,{q_{i}})=-{L_{i}}.\end{split}" text="r@(@p@,@x@)@=@r@(@p@,@p _ i@)@+@x@,@qquad@d / (d * x)@r@(@p@,@x@)@=@1@,@quad@[and ]@r@(@p@,@p _ i@)@-@r@(@p@,@q _ i@)@=@-@L _ i@PERIOD" xml:id="S0.E9.m1">

                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.E9.m1.49.1">

  <para xml:id="p17">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_kirchhoff_and_term2" xml:id="S0.Ex7">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle 4Kf({\Gamma})=v\cdot\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}%&#10;\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}+\sum_{e_{i}%&#10;\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\sum_{p\in{V({\Gamma})}}\big{(%&#10;}r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)\big{)}.\end{split}" text="4 * K * f * Gamma = v cdot (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2) + (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (sum _ (p element-of V * Gamma))@(r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p)))" xml:id="S0.Ex7.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S0.Ex7.m1.37"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex7.m1.37">
                  <XMRef idref="S0.Ex7.m1.7"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex7.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex7.m1.2"/>

                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p18">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_kirchhoff_and_term2a" xml:id="S0.Ex8">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\sum_{p\in{V({\Gamma})}}\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})%&#10;}}\frac{{L_{i}}(R_{a_{i},p}-R_{b_{i},p})^{2}}{({L_{i}}+{R_{i}})^{2}}=2\sum_{p,%&#10;\,q\in{V({\Gamma})}}r(p,q)-\sum_{e_{i}\in\,{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+%&#10;{R_{i}}}\sum_{p\in{V({\Gamma})}}\big{(}r({p_{i}},p)+r({q_{i}},p)\big{)}.\end{split}" text="(sum _ (p element-of V * Gamma))@((sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((L _ i * (R _ (list@(a _ i, p)) - R _ (list@(b _ i, p))) ^ 2) / (L _ i + R _ i) ^ 2)) = 2 * (sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma))@(r * open-interval@(p, q)) - (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (sum _ (p element-of V * Gamma))@(r * open-interval@(p _ i, p) + r * open-interval@(q _ i, p)))" xml:id="S0.Ex8.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p19">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex9">
      <Math mode="display" tex="(v-4)Kf({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}Kf(%&#10;{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})-v\cdot y({\Gamma})." text="(v - 4) * K * f * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) - (v cdot y) * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.4"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.4">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.4.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.2">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.1">Γ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex9.m1.4.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex9.m1.4.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN">Γ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p23">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_contraction_for_r" xml:id="S0.Ex13">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle(v-2)r({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R%&#10;_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}r({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}).\end{split}" text="(v - 2) * r * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * r * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i)" xml:id="S0.Ex13.m1">

          <XMDual>
            <XMDual>

    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_contraction_generalej2" xml:id="S0.Ex15">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle(v-2)r({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({%&#10;\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\sum_{e_{j}\in{E({\Gamma})}}r_{{{%&#10;\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}}(p_{j},q_{j})\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\sum_{%&#10;e_{j}\in{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}})}}r_{{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}}(p_{j},q%&#10;_{j}),\qquad\text{since }.\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}r({{%&#10;\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i}).\end{split}" text="(@v@-@2@)@r@(@Gamma@)@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@sum _ (e _ j element-of E * Gamma)@r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ i@(@p _ j@,@q _ j@)@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@sum _ (e _ j element-of E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i)@r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ i@(@p _ j@,@q _ j@)@,@qquad@[since ]@PERIOD@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@r@(@(overline@(Gamma)) _ i@)@PERIOD" xml:id="S0.Ex15.m1">

    <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="S0.EGx1">
      <equation xml:id="S0.Ex16">
        <MathFork>
          <Math tex="\displaystyle(v-2)x({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}%&#10;+{R_{i}}}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})," text="(v - 2) * x * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * x * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i)" xml:id="S0.Ex16.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S0.Ex16.m5.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex16.m5.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex16.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}&amp;\displaystyle x({\Gamma})=x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})\quad\text%&#10;{when is a bridge, and so }x({\Gamma})=x(\beta).\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})=x(\overline{\beta}_{i})\quad\text{%&#10;when is not a bridge}.\end{split}" text="formulae@(formulae@(x * Gamma = x * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i, [when is a bridge, and so ] * x * Gamma = x * beta), x * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i = list@(x * (overline@(beta)) _ i, [when is not a bridge]))" xml:id="S0.E11.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S0.E11.m1.35"/>

                            <XMRef idref="S0.E11.m1.3"/>

  <para xml:id="p28">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_contraction_xb" xml:id="S0.E12">
      <tags>
        <tag>(12)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">12</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_%&#10;{i}}}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}-B(%&#10;{\Gamma})}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})+\sum_{e_{i%&#10;}\in B({\Gamma})}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}-B({\Gamma})}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R%&#10;_{i}}}x(\beta)+\sum_{e_{i}\in B({\Gamma})}x(\beta),\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=(v-t-2)x(\beta)+t\cdot x(\beta),\qquad\text{using \@@cite[cite]%&#10;{[\@@bibref{}{C5}{}{}, Theorem 4.12]} for .}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=(v-2)x({\Gamma}),\qquad\text{by using {Equation~{}(\ref{{eqn %&#10;contraction xa}})}}.\end{split}" text="sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@x@(@(overline@(Gamma)) _ i@)@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma - B * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@x@(@(overline@(Gamma)) _ i@)@+@sum _ (e _ i element-of B * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@x@(@(overline@(Gamma)) _ i@)@=@sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma - B * Gamma)@R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)@x@(@beta@)@+@sum _ (e _ i element-of B * Gamma)@x@(@beta@)@PUNCT@=@(@v@-@t@-@2@)@x@(@beta@)@+@t@cdot@x@(@beta@)@,@qquad@[using [, Theorem 4.12] for .]@=@(@v@-@2@)@x@(@Gamma@)@,@qquad@[by using Equation ()]@PERIOD" xml:id="S0.E12.m1">

  <para xml:id="p29">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_r_x_and_y" xml:id="S0.E13">
      <tags>
        <tag>(13)</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">13</tag>
      </tags>
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle(v-2)r({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R%&#10;_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}r({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}%&#10;}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}\big{(}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})+y({{%&#10;\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})\big{)}.\end{split}" text="(v - 2) * r * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * r * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * (x * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i + y * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i))" xml:id="S0.E13.m1">

  <para xml:id="p32">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex19">
      <Math mode="display" tex="-Kf({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}Kf({{%&#10;\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})-3\cdot y({\Gamma})=\sum_{e_{i}\in{E({\Gamma})}}\frac{%&#10;R_{i}}{{L_{i}}+{R_{i}}}y({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i})-3\cdot y({\Gamma})=-2y({%&#10;\Gamma})," text="- K * f * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) - (3 cdot y) * Gamma = (sum _ (e _ i element-of E * Gamma))@((R _ i / (L _ i + R _ i)) * y * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i) - (3 cdot y) * Gamma = - 2 * y * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex19.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex19.m1.7"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex19.m1.7">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex19.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex19.m1.3">Γ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex19.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p33">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex20">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle\frac{(v-2)!}{(v-k-2)!}x({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=%&#10;\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{2}}}{L_{i_{2}}+%&#10;R_{i_{2}}}\;\dots\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{k}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k-1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{k%&#10;}}}{L_{i_{k}}+R_{i_{k}}}x({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k}}),\\&#10;\displaystyle\frac{(v-2)!}{(v-k-2)!}y({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{2}}}{L_{i_{2}}+%&#10;R_{i_{2}}}\;\dots\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{k}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k-1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{k%&#10;}}}{L_{i_{k}}+R_{i_{k}}}y({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k}}).\end{split}" text="formulae@(((v - 2)factorial / (v - k - 2)factorial) * x * Gamma = (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@((R _ i _ 2 / (L _ i _ 2 + R _ i _ 2)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ k element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (k - 1)))]])@((R _ i _ k / (L _ i _ k + R _ i _ k)) * x * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ k))))), ((v - 2)factorial / (v - k - 2)factorial) * y * Gamma = (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@((R _ i _ 2 / (L _ i _ 2 + R _ i _ 2)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ k element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (k - 1)))]])@((R _ i _ k / (L _ i _ k + R _ i _ k)) * y * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ k))))))" xml:id="S0.Ex20.m1">

                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid" xml:id="S0.Ex20.m1.10">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMArray class="ltx_align_c" name="list" rowsep="0.0pt" xml:id="S0.Ex20.m1.11.1">
                                <XMRow>
                                  <XMCell>

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p34">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex21">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle Kf({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\frac{(v-4-k)!}{(v-4)!}%&#10;\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{2}}}{L_{i_{2}}+%&#10;R_{i_{2}}}\;\dots\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{k}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k-1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{k%&#10;}}}{L_{i_{k}}+R_{i_{k}}}Kf({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k}})\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\qquad-\frac{\big{(}v^{2}-(k+2)v+k-1\big{)}k}{(v-k-2)(v-k-3)}y({%&#10;\Gamma}).\end{split}" text="K * f * Gamma = ((v - 4 - k)factorial / (v - 4)factorial) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@((R _ i _ 2 / (L _ i _ 2 + R _ i _ 2)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ k element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (k - 1)))]])@((R _ i _ k / (L _ i _ k + R _ i _ k)) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ k))))) - (((((v ^ 2 - (k + 2) * v) + k) - 1) * k) / ((v - k - 2) * (v - k - 3))) * y * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex21.m1">

  <para xml:id="p35">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex22">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle Kf({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\frac{1}{(v-4)!}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{2}}}{L_{i_{2}}+%&#10;R_{i_{2}}}\;\dots\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{v-4}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-5}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{v%&#10;-4}}}{L_{i_{v-4}}+R_{i_{v-4}}}Kf({{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-4}})%&#10;\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\qquad-\frac{(3v-5)(v-4)}{2}y({\Gamma}).\end{split}" text="K * f * Gamma = (1 / (v - 4)factorial) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@((R _ i _ 2 / (L _ i _ 2 + R _ i _ 2)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ (v - 4) element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 5)))]])@((R _ i _ (v - 4) / (L _ i _ (v - 4) + R _ i _ (v - 4))) * K * f * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 4)))))) - (((3 * v - 5) * (v - 4)) / 2) * y * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex22.m1">

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p36">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex23">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\frac{v}{v-4}+\sum_{i=1}^{k-1}\frac{v-i}{v-4-i}\prod_{j=1}^{i}\frac{v-1-j}{v-3%&#10;-j}=\frac{\big{(}v^{2}-(k+2)v+k-1\big{)}k}{(v-k-2)(v-k-3)}." text="v / (v - 4) + ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ (k - 1))@(((v - i) / (v - 4 - i)) * ((product _ (j = 1)) ^ i)@((v - 1 - j) / (v - 3 - j))) = ((((v ^ 2 - (k + 2) * v) + k) - 1) * k) / ((v - k - 2) * (v - k - 3))" xml:id="S0.Ex23.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex23.m1.4"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex23.m1.4">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>

                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>

                          <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
            </XMWrap>
          </XMDual>
        </XMath>
      </Math>
    </equation>
  </para>

      <Math mode="display" tex="(v-2)!y({\Gamma})=\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{2}}}{L_{i_{2}}+%&#10;R_{i_{2}}}\;\dots\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{v-2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-3}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{v%&#10;-2}}}{L_{i_{v-2}}+R_{i_{v-2}}}r_{{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-2}}}(%&#10;p^{\prime},q^{\prime})." text="(v - 2)factorial * y * Gamma = (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@((R _ i _ 2 / (L _ i _ 2 + R _ i _ 2)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ (v - 2) element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 3)))]])@((R _ i _ (v - 2) / (L _ i _ (v - 2) + R _ i _ (v - 2))) * r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 2))) * open-interval@(p ^ prime, q ^ prime))))" xml:id="S0.Ex24.m1">

  <para xml:id="p38">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex25">
      <Math mode="display" tex="Kf({\Gamma})=\frac{1}{(v-2)!}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{1}}}{L_{i_{1}}+R_{i_{1}}}\dots\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{v-2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-3}}})}\end{subarray}}\frac{R_{i_{v%&#10;-2}}}{L_{i_{v-2}}+R_{i_{v-2}}}m\cdot k\cdot r_{{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},%&#10;\dots,i_{v-2}}}(p^{\prime},q^{\prime})." text="K * f * Gamma = (1 / (v - 2)factorial) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((R _ i _ 1 / (L _ i _ 1 + R _ i _ 1)) * dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ (v - 2) element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 3)))]])@((((R _ i _ (v - 2) / (L _ i _ (v - 2) + R _ i _ (v - 2))) * m) cdot k cdot r _ (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 2)))) * open-interval@(p ^ prime, q ^ prime)))" xml:id="S0.Ex25.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex25.m1.11"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex25.m1.11">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex25.m1.10"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex25.m1.10">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="factorial" role="POSTFIX">!</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex25.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex25.m1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex29">
      <Math mode="display" tex="W({\Gamma}):=\frac{1}{2}\sum_{p,\,q\in{V({\Gamma})}}d(p,q)." text="W * Gamma assign (1 / 2) * (sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma))@(d * open-interval@(p, q))" xml:id="S0.Ex29.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex29.m1.7"/>

              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex29.m1.7">

                    <XMWrap>

  <para xml:id="p47">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex33">
      <Math mode="display" tex="W({\Gamma})=\frac{1}{4}\Big{[}v(v-1)+\sum_{p,\,\,q\in{V({\Gamma})}}{\upsilon}(%&#10;q)r(p,q)\Big{]}." text="W * Gamma = (1 / 4) * delimited-[]@(v * (v - 1) + (sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma))@(upsilon * q * r * open-interval@(p, q)))" xml:id="S0.Ex33.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex33.m1.8"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex33.m1.8">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex33.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="Gamma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S0.Ex33.m1.4">Γ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>

  <para xml:id="p51">
    <equation labels="LABEL:eqn_wiener2" xml:id="S0.Ex37">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle 2{\ell({\Gamma})}&amp;\displaystyle=\sum_{p,\,\,q\in{V(%&#10;{\Gamma})}}(2-{\upsilon}(p))(2-{\upsilon}(q))r(p,q).\quad\text{Using the %&#10;definition of gives}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=8W({\Gamma})+\sum_{p,\,\,q\in{V({\Gamma})}}{\upsilon}(p){%&#10;\upsilon}(q)r(p,q)-4\sum_{p,\,\,q\in{V({\Gamma})}}{\upsilon}(q)r(p,q),\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=-8W({\Gamma})+4v\cdot{\ell({\Gamma})}+\sum_{p,\,\,q\in{V({%&#10;\Gamma})}}{\upsilon}(p){\upsilon}(q)r(p,q),\quad\text{by {Theorem~{}\ref{{thm %&#10;wiener tree1}}}.}\end{split}" text="2@ell@(@Gamma@)@=@sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma)@(@2@-@upsilon@(@p@)@)@(@2@-@upsilon@(@q@)@)@r@(@p@,@q@)@.@quad@[Using the definition of gives]@=@8@W@(@Gamma@)@+@sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma)@upsilon@(@p@)@upsilon@(@q@)@r@(@p@,@q@)@-@4@sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma)@upsilon@(@q@)@r@(@p@,@q@)@PUNCT@=@-@8@W@(@Gamma@)@+@4@v@cdot@ell@(@Gamma@)@+@sum _ (list@(p, q) element-of V * Gamma)@upsilon@(@p@)@upsilon@(@q@)@r@(@p@,@q@)@,@quad@[by Theorem .]" xml:id="S0.Ex37.m1">

    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex38">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\frac{(v-4-k)!}{(v-4)!}%&#10;\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\;\dots\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{k}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k-1}}})}\end{subarray}}W({{\overline%&#10;{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{k}})-\frac{\big{(}v^{2}-(k+2)v+k-1\big{)}k}{(v-k-2)%&#10;(v-k-3)}{\ell({\Gamma})}.\end{split}" text="W * Gamma = ((v - 4 - k)factorial / (v - 4)factorial) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@(dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ k element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (k - 1)))]])@(W * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ k))))) - (((((v ^ 2 - (k + 2) * v) + k) - 1) * k) / ((v - k - 2) * (v - k - 3))) * ell * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex38.m1">

  <para xml:id="p54">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex39">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=\frac{1}{(v-4)!}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}}\in\\&#10;{E({\Gamma})}\end{subarray}}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{2}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1}}})}\end{subarray}}\;\dots\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{v-4}}\in\\&#10;{E({{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-5}}})}\end{subarray}}W({{\overline%&#10;{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-4}})-\frac{(3v-5)(v-4)}{2}{\ell({\Gamma})}.\end{split}" text="W * Gamma = (1 / (v - 4)factorial) * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ 1 element-of absent], [E * Gamma]])@((sum _ list[[e _ i _ 2 element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ i _ 1]])@(dots * (sum _ list[[e _ i _ (v - 4) element-of absent], [E * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 5)))]])@(W * (overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 4)))))) - (((3 * v - 5) * (v - 4)) / 2) * ell * Gamma" xml:id="S0.Ex39.m1">

  <para xml:id="p55">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex40">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W({\Gamma})&amp;\displaystyle=(v-1)^{2}+\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}\{e_{i_{1}},\,e_{i_{2}},\,\cdots,\,e_{i_{v-4}}\}\subset{E({%&#10;\Gamma})}\\&#10;{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-4}}=P_{4}\end{subarray}}1,\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=(v-1)^{2}+\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}\{e_{i_{1}},\,e_{i_{2}},\,e_%&#10;{i_{3}}\}\subset{E({\Gamma})}\\&#10;e_{i_{1}},e_{i_{2}},e_{i_{3}}\in P\\&#10;\text{P is a path in }\end{subarray}}1.\end{split}" text="W@(@Gamma@)@=@(@v@-@1@) ^ 2@+@sum _ list[[set@(e _ i _ 1, e _ i _ 2, cdots, e _ i _ (v - 4)) subset-of E * Gamma], [(overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 4))) = P _ 4]]@1@PUNCT@=@(@v@-@1@) ^ 2@+@sum _ list[[set@(e _ i _ 1, e _ i _ 2, e _ i _ 3) subset-of E * Gamma], [list@(e _ i _ 1, e _ i _ 2, e _ i _ 3) element-of P], [[P is a path in ]]]@1@PERIOD" xml:id="S0.Ex40.m1">

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p57">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex42">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W({\Gamma})=(v-1)^{2}+\frac{1}{(v-4)!}\sum_{%&#10;\begin{subarray}{c}e_{i_{1}},\,e_{i_{2}},\,\cdots,\,e_{i_{v-4}}\in{E({\Gamma})%&#10;}\\&#10;{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-4}}=P_{4}\end{subarray}}1=(v-1)^{2}+%&#10;\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}\{e_{i_{1}},\,e_{i_{2}},\,\cdots,\,e_{i_{v-4}}\}%&#10;\subset{E({\Gamma})}\\&#10;{{\overline{\Gamma}}}_{i_{1},\dots,i_{v-4}}=P_{4}\end{subarray}}1.\end{split}" text="W * Gamma = (v - 1) ^ 2 + (1 / (v - 4)factorial) * (sum _ list[[list@(e _ i _ 1, e _ i _ 2, cdots, e _ i _ (v - 4)) element-of E * Gamma], [(overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 4))) = P _ 4]])@(1) = (v - 1) ^ 2 + (sum _ list[[set@(e _ i _ 1, e _ i _ 2, cdots, e _ i _ (v - 4)) subset-of E * Gamma], [(overline@(Gamma)) _ (list@(i _ 1, dots, i _ (v - 4))) = P _ 4]])@(1)" xml:id="S0.Ex42.m1">

  <para xml:id="p58">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex43">
      <Math mode="display" tex="(v-1)^{2}=W(S_{v})\leq W({\Gamma})\leq W(P_{v})=\frac{v(v^{2}-1)}{6}." text="(v - 1) ^ 2 = W * S _ v less= W * Gamma less= W * P _ v = (v * (v ^ 2 - 1)) / 6" xml:id="S0.Ex43.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex43.m1.3"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex43.m1.3">
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex43.m1.3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex43.m1.3.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

  <para xml:id="p63">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex48">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W(\beta_{3})&amp;\displaystyle=(s+t+k+3)^{2}+\binom{s}{%&#10;1}\binom{2}{1}\binom{k}{1}+\binom{s}{1}\binom{2}{2}+\binom{2}{2}\binom{k}{1}+%&#10;\binom{s}{1}\binom{2}{1}\binom{t}{1}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\quad+\binom{s}{1}\binom{2}{2}+\binom{2}{2}\binom{t}{1}+\binom{k%&#10;}{1}\binom{2}{1}\binom{t}{1}+\binom{k}{1}\binom{2}{2}+\binom{2}{2}\binom{t}{1}%&#10;\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=(s+t+k+3)^{2}+2(sk+st+kt+s+t+k).\end{split}" text="W * beta _ 3 = (s + t + k + 3) ^ 2 + binomial@(s, 1) * binomial@(2, 1) * binomial@(k, 1) + binomial@(s, 1) * binomial@(2, 2) + binomial@(2, 2) * binomial@(k, 1) + binomial@(s, 1) * binomial@(2, 1) * binomial@(t, 1) + binomial@(s, 1) * binomial@(2, 2) + binomial@(2, 2) * binomial@(t, 1) + binomial@(k, 1) * binomial@(2, 1) * binomial@(t, 1) + binomial@(k, 1) * binomial@(2, 2) + binomial@(2, 2) * binomial@(t, 1) = (s + t + k + 3) ^ 2 + 2 * (s * k + s * t + k * t + s + t + k)" xml:id="S0.Ex48.m1">

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p64">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex49">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W(\beta_{4})&amp;\displaystyle=(s+t+k+m+3)^{2}+2(sk+st+%&#10;kt+s+t+k)+\binom{m}{1}\Big{[}\binom{s}{1}+\binom{k}{1}+\binom{t}{1}\Big{]}\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle=(s+t+k+m+3)^{2}+2(sk+st+kt)+(m+2)(s+t+k).\end{split}" text="W * beta _ 4 = (s + t + k + m + 3) ^ 2 + 2 * (s * k + s * t + k * t + s + t + k) + binomial@(m, 1) * delimited-[]@(binomial@(s, 1) + binomial@(k, 1) + binomial@(t, 1)) = (s + t + k + m + 3) ^ 2 + 2 * (s * k + s * t + k * t) + (m + 2) * (s + t + k)" xml:id="S0.Ex49.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.93"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex49.m1.93">
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.9"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.93.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.10"/>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex49.m1.93.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.11"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.12.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.13"/>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.14"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.27"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.93.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMRef idref="S0.Ex49.m1.15"/>

    </equation>
  </para>
  <para xml:id="p65">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex50">
      <Math mode="display" tex="W(\beta_{5})=(v-1)^{2}+2(sk+st+kt+mn+kn+sn)+(n+2)(s+k)+(m+2)(s+k+t+1)+n(t+5)." text="W * beta _ 5 = (v - 1) ^ 2 + 2 * (s * k + s * t + k * t + m * n + k * n + s * n) + (n + 2) * (s + k) + (m + 2) * (s + k + t + 1) + n * (t + 5)" xml:id="S0.Ex50.m1">
        <XMath>
          <XMDual>
            <XMRef idref="S0.Ex50.m1.1"/>
            <XMWrap>
              <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex50.m1.1">
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S0.Ex50.m1.1.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex50.m1.1.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="5" role="NUMBER">5</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S0.Ex50.m1.1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S0.Ex50.m1.1.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

  <para xml:id="p66">
    <equation xml:id="S0.Ex51">
      <Math mode="display" tex="\begin{split}\displaystyle W(\beta_{6})&amp;\displaystyle=(v-1)^{2}+2(sk+st+kt+mn+%&#10;kn+sn)+(n+4)(s+k)+n(t+6)\\&#10;&amp;\displaystyle\quad+(m+2)(s+k+t+2)+h(3s+3k+2n+2m+t+6).\end{split}" text="W * beta _ 6 = (v - 1) ^ 2 + 2 * (s * k + s * t + k * t + m * n + k * n + s * n) + (n + 4) * (s + k) + n * (t + 6) + (m + 2) * (s + k + t + 2) + h * (3 * s + 3 * k + 2 * n + 2 * m + t + 6)" xml:id="S0.Ex51.m1">
